block.name: pycharm
block.text:
Properties (#1)

Now the field the robot can move in is constrained in size to 100 x 100, but at the borders of the field the robot teleports: if the robot is in the cell (0,0) and goes up 1 step, he arrives at the cell (0,99):

(0,0)
// goUp(1)
(0,99)
// goLeft(10)
(90,99)

Share feedback
